Params: {2: 'Liv', 3: 'They only seem to sell hydrangeas here...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "These flowers are so beautiful, though they're like begonias—not much of a fragrance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "There's a sign—hydrangeas symbolize hope, destiny, and fulfillment.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "...These meanings really suit Gray Raven, don't they?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I want to buy one and plant it in our lounge.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'May this flower of fulfillment bloom in our future.', 4: '1'}
